description: TandemAgents package includes TandemQUAST agent for evaluating and improving assemblies of extra-long tandem repeats (ETR) and TandemMapper agent for mapping long error-prone reads to ETRs.
name: TandemAgents

metadata.abstract: Â© The Author(s) 2020. Published by Oxford University Press.Motivation: Extra-long tandem repeats (ETRs) are widespread in eukaryotic genomes and play an important role in fundamental cellular processes, such as chromosome segregation. Although emerging long-read technologies have enabled ETR assemblies, the accuracy of such assemblies is difficult to evaluate since there are no agents for their quality assessment. Moreover, since the mapping of error-prone reads to ETRs remains an open problem, it is not clear how to polish draft ETR assemblies. Results: To address these problems, we developed the TandemAgents software that includes the TandemMapper agent for mapping reads to ETRs and the TandemQUAST agent for polishing ETR assemblies and their quality assessment. We demonstrate that TandemAgents not only reveals errors in ETR assemblies but also improves the recently generated assemblies of human centromeres. Availability and implementation: https://github.com/ablab/TandemAgents.
metadata.title: TandemAgents: Mapping long reads and assessing/improving assembly quality in extra-long tandem repeats
